baseRule.text: 若比丘獨與女人屏處坐。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer heimlich mit einer Frau an einem verborgenen Platz zusammensitzt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk sits down in private on a concealed seat with a woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu se sienta en privado, en un asiento aislado, con una mujer: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。食家中獨與一女人臥處強坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 43

fullParallels.text: 若比丘食家中共女人坐者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 43

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻知有食家在屏處強立者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 43

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。食家中與女人坐。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 42

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知食家屏處坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 54

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！食家中有寶，在屏處坐者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

translations.text: If a monk eating in a house known to contain women, shall sit apart in a private or concealed place, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu duduk di suatu tempat terpencil di rumah seorang penyokong di mana terdapat sebuah harta, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘食家中有寶。屏處坐者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 44

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṁ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 125

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer heimlich, zusammen mit einem Mann an einem verborgenen Platz sitzt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni sit in private on a secluded seat with a man, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang duduk secara pribadi di sebuah tempat duduk tersendiri dengan seorang pria, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，食家中有寶，在屏處坐者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼食家中與男子坐。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 29

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。食家中獨與一男子舍內強坐。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 28

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。知食家屏處坐波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 44
